long_description:
March Madness is upon us and there is nothing more important than a bracket with good odds and a great place to catch the upsets, victories, nail-biters, and championship. Here are the best places in the Nob Hill area to watch the games.

 

Hotel Room Stay in your pajamas and avoid the crowds in the comfort of your room. We have 42” tvs in every room and food delivery is is just a click away with apps such as Caviar and Uber Eats. If you want to watch multiple games on your smart phone, lap top and tablet, you’re in luck because we have free wi-fi throughout the hotel.

 

Stanford Court Lobby Want to get out of your room but not deal with the big crowds- fear not! You can catch all of the games at our lobby bar. We have great beers on tap and our bartenders can whip up anything to your liking.

 

The Wreck Room Just head three block west on California Street and you will find yourself at one of the best sports bars in the city. Not only can you watch the games, you can play pop-a-shot, pool, darts, and shuffleboard.

 

Ace’s This dive bar is a great spot on Bush Street, just a few blocks away from the hotel. Things can get pretty cramped in there but the energy of the crowd is unlike anything else. Bonus: there is a pizza by the slice spot a few doors down. Perfect for halftime and late night eats.

 

Golden Gate Tap Room Golden Gate Tap Room is the sports bar in the area. With several levels, it boasts the best selection of seats to watch the games on BIG screens. Most games are shown with a projector- you feel like you are watching a movie. Lots of great beer on tap and honestly, some of the best service in all of the San Francisco bars.

 

Follow us on Instagram to see our favorite spots!
